alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 01 at 5:10PM EDT until October 02 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TO 8 PM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Northeast Suffolk, Southwest Suffolk and Southeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM to 8 PM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Minor to localized moderate flooding may be possible with the Monday afternoon and early evening high tide cycle. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. PECONIC RIVER AT RIVERHEAD NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 5.6 FT, MODERATE 6.3 FT, MAJOR 7.1 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 2.2 FT, MODERATE 2.9 FT, MAJOR 3.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/05 PM 4.7/ 5.2 1.3/ 1.8 1.3/ 1.8 1 NONE 02/06 AM 4.2/ 4.7 0.8/ 1.3 1.6/ 2.0 2 NONE 02/06 PM 5.7/ 6.2 2.2/ 2.7 2.3/ 2.8 2 MINOR 03/07 AM 5.0/ 5.5 1.6/ 2.0 2.3/ 2.8 2 NONE 03/07 PM 5.2/ 5.7 1.8/ 2.2 2.0/ 2.5 2 NONE 04/07 AM 4.0/ 4.5 0.7/ 1.1 1.6/ 2.0 2 NONE ORIENT HARBOR AT ORIENT POINT NY MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk
